title: dEvAdi dEvam sadA
sahitya:
dEvAdi dEvam sadA divya rUpam bhAva atItam bhAvayE santatam


anupallavi

  shrI vAsudEva suputram pavitram bhaktAbhi candram bhajE bAlakrSNam


caraNam   vEdAnta sAram sakalAdhAram rAdhA samEtam ramaNita nAtham
ArAdhya adbhuta Ananda bhAtam bhUrAja pUjita puNya nEtam
